raw: Parliament to debate Bill on plans for possible election amid COVID-19 pandemic .
replaced: Parliament to debate Bill on plans for possible election amid COVID-19 pandemic .

raw: SINGAPORE — A Bill on contingency plans to be put in place should a general election be held amid the COVID-19 outbreak will be debated in Parliament next Tuesday ( 7 April ) .
replaced: SINGAPORE — A Bill on contingency plans to be put in place should a general election be held amid the COVID-19 outbreak will be debated in Parliament next Tuesday ( 7 April ) .

raw: In response to media queries , the Elections Department ( ELD ) said on Friday that , in view of the rapidly evolving COVID-19 situation , it must make contingency plans for precautionary measures to ensure a safe election , should the upcoming general election take place amid the pandemic .
replaced: In response to media queries , ELD said on Friday that , in view of the rapidly evolving COVID-19 situation , ELD must make contingency plans for precautionary measures to ensure a safe election , should a general election take place amid the COVID-19 pandemic .

raw: “ The Parliamentary Elections ( COVID-19 Special Arrangements ) Bill contains the necessary legislative provisions to allow ELD to implement temporary arrangements to ensure the safety of voters , candidates and election officials during Parliamentary elections held on or before 14 April 2021 , ” said ELD .
replaced: “ The Parliamentary Elections ( COVID-19 Special Arrangements ) Bill contains the necessary legislative provisions to allow ELD to implement temporary arrangements to ensure the safety of voters , candidates and election officials during Parliamentary elections held on or before 14 April 2021 , ” said ELD .

raw: “ The health and safety of voters , candidates and election officials is paramount to us , ” it added .
replaced: “ The health and safety of voters , candidates and election officials is paramount to us , ” The Parliamentary Elections ( COVID-19 Special Arrangements ) Bill added .

raw: In recent weeks , Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong has given strong hints that a general election will be held shortly .
replaced: In recent weeks , PM Lee has given strong hints that a general election will be held shortly .

raw: The ruling People ’s Action Party ’s term ends on 15 January 2021 , after which an election must be held by 14 April 2021 .
replaced: The ruling People ’s Action Party ’s term ends on 15 January 2021 , after which an election must be held by 14 April 2021 .

raw: As of Wednesday , Singapore has confirmed 1,000 cases of COVID-19 infection , with 245 patients fully recovered and discharged .
replaced: As of Wednesday , Singapore has confirmed 1,000 cases of COVID-19 infection , with 245 patients fully recovered and discharged .

raw: On Friday morning , a fifth patient - an 86 - year - old female Singaporean - died of the disease .
